name: Curve pETH-ETH Pool
description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This Curve factory liqudity pool contains pETH and ETH. pETH is a ETH derivative supported by [JPEG'd protocol](https://jpegd.io/peth).
